title: Ballerina Orianna skin idea!
body:
Hey guys

here is my skin concept idea of Ballerina Orianna

Please tell me what you think

replies.body: Riot should have done this Orianna skin http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/BEMtQakl-jade-palace-orianna for Lunar Revel instead of the two stupid boring Katarina and Nidalee skins.
That actually looks really cool and detailed. I like!
Dayum that would be amazing. I main Orianna so... YUS!
i think it looks to much like other oriana skins like the showdown one except pink i think if riot wanna make another oriana skin they need to think out of the box, think off something very different

Surpise party Orianna should be a thing and her ball an be a speherical present
 {{champion:61}}
